==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=覩}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|目|者|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*l-ta-s/t||to see, to look}}; cognate with {{cog|bo|ལྟ||to look at, to see}} ({{zh-ref|LaPolla, 1994}}). It has also been connected with {{cog|tai-pro|*p.taːᴬ||eye}} ({{zh-ref|Unger, 1990}}).
